info.description: API to create, update and manage transactions related to accounts such as inward/outward funds transfers and bulk transfers.
info.title: Management of fund transfers

get.description: Retrieves list of funds transfer details such as type of transaction, date & amount for the specified customer accounts

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.description: Retrieves the list of bulk transfer details such as transaction reference, type, currency, amount & accounts involved in the transaction occurred in a day

parameters.name: bulkTransferId
parameters.description: Identifier of the Bulk Transfer

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

post.description: Create an inward transfer with details such as transaction type, amount, date, commission and ordering bank & customer

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

commissionCode.description: These field control the allocation of Periodic commission where the field COMM.CODE is the trigger for periodic commission and the field CSN.CODE is a system maintained field and hold the commission amount relating to the period band

commissionType.description: Identifies the Commission Types which are applicable to the transaction

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

beneficiaryAddresses.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

beneficiaryAddressCity.description: City of the beneficiary account. For example: London, Dallas etc.

paymentDetails.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

paymentDetail.description: Indicates the payment details for the beneficiary to apply the payment.

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

commissionCode.description: These field control the allocation of Periodic commission where the field COMM.CODE is the trigger for periodic commission and the field CSN.CODE is a system maintained field and hold the commission amount relating to the period band

commissionType.description: Identifies the Commission Types which are applicable to the transaction

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

debitReference.description: Reference for debit party of a payment transaction

creditReference.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

treasuryRate.description: The Treasury rate for the conversion between payment currency and the ordering currency

negotiatedDealerId.description: Identifies the Negotiated Dealer Reference of the foreign exchange internal deal created to cover the exchange rate

chequeNumber.description: Cheque number associated with the transaction or accounting entry.

customerSpread.description: The spread that is applied to the published internal exchange rates to derive the final exchange rate or the customer rate for the transaction

baseCurrency.description: Contains the currency of the arrangement which linked to the package or bundle

profitCentreCustomer.description: Identifies the customer of profit and loss entries generated in relation to the current transaction

profitCentreDepartment.description: Identifies the Account Officer or Department Code of Profit and Loss entries generated in relation to the current transaction

clearingDate.description: Contains the date from which the payment is expected and is used to indicate the exposure date for the payment.

cashRoundType.description: Indicates the type of rounding to be applied for cash transactions of a currency.

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

debitAccountIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the debtor account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

creditAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of the credit account

accountWithBankIBAN.description: This is the IBAN of the institution where beneficiary holds an account

receiverCorrespondentAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of receiver correspondent bank's account number.

intermediatoryBankAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of the intermediatory bank account number

orderingCustomerAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of the ordering customer account number.

chargeAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of charge or commission account numbers

beneficiaryCountryId.description: Country of the beneficiary account number. For example: US, IN, EU

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

customerRate.description: The exchange rate that is actually applied for currency conversion in case of transactions involving FX conversion.

bankSortCode.description: The sort code or the national clearing code of the beneficiary bank.

orderingCustomerIds.description: Indicates the customer id for the ordering customer

orderingCustomerId.description: Indicates the customer id for the ordering customer

accountWithBanks.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary

beneficiaryAddresses.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

beneficiaryAddress.description: The address of the Beneficiary if the customer number of the Beneficiary is not known

beneficiaryAddressCity.description: City of the beneficiary account. For example: London, Dallas etc.

beneficiaryCustomerIds.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.
